General.Name: Midasco Capital Corp
General.Description: Midasco Capital Corp. does not have significant operations. Previously, the company was engaged in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company was formerly known as Midasco Gold Corp. and changed its name to Midasco Capital Corp. in July 2001. Midasco Capital Corp. was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

1.Name: Mr. Ryan E. S. K. Cheung B.Com., CA, CPA
1.Title: CFO, Corp. Sec. & Director
